biotools.summary: Online service for identifying the MHC Class-I binding regions in antigens. It implements matrices for 47 MHC Class-I alleles, proteasomal and immunoproteasomal models. The main aim of this server is to help users in identifying the promiscuous regions.

bioschemas.name: ProPred1
bioschemas.summary: Online service for identifying the MHC Class-I binding regions in antigens. It implements matrices for 47 MHC Class-I alleles, proteasomal and immunoproteasomal models. The main aim of this server is to help users in identifying the promiscuous regions.
